name: Amulet
description: A pendant worn around the neck on a chain or cord.

name: Belt
description: A sturdy leather belt worn around the waist.

name: Bracer
description: A protective band worn around the forearm.

name: Ring
description: A simple band of metal worn on the finger.

name: 15 ft. Rope [5 Units]
description: A sturdy 5 unit length of rope, useful for climbing, tying, or securing equipment

name: 30 ft. Rope [10 Units]
description: A 10 unit rope, essential for longer climbs or more complex tasks requiring more length

name: 40-Page Journal
description: A sturdy bound journal containing 40 blank pages, ideal for recording adventures or sketching

name: 45 ft. Rope [15 Units]
description: A 15 unit rope, versatile for a variety of situations from scaling walls to crossing gaps

name: 60 ft. Rope [20 Units]
description: A substantial 20 unit length of rope, ideal for challenging climbs or significant distances

name: 90 ft. Spool of Invisible String [30 Units]
description: String that is so thin, it is nearly invisible to the eye, making it an idea material for creating traps.

name: 90 ft. Spool of String [30 Units]
description: Thin but durable string useful for setting trap triggers or marking paths

name: Disguise Kit
description: Contains makeup, wigs, and prosthetics for altering one's appearance

name: Fishing Pole
description: A collapsible rod with line and hooks for catching fish

name: Grappling Hook
description: A four-pronged metal hook designed to catch on edges when thrown

name: Grinding File
description: A metal file for shaping metal or removing rust

name: Hand Saw
description: A portable saw with sharp teeth for cutting wood or bone

name: Iron Pan
description: A heavy skillet for cooking over open flames

name: Iron Pot
description: A sturdy pot with lid for boiling water or cooking stews

name: Large Net
description: A large square net that is 3 units wide and long, designed for trapping large creatures or catching large quantities of fish.

name: Lead Weight
description: A heavy weight for fishing lines, creating traps or measuring depths

name: Long Chain
description: A heavy iron chain spanning 3 units, useful for securing heavy objects or prisoners. These changes can be fastened together to increase their length.

name: Luxurious Tent
description: A spacious silk tent with room dividers that comfortably sleeps four

name: Mortar and Pestle
description: Stone tools for grinding herbs, spices, or alchemical ingredients

name: Needle
description: A set of sewing needles for repairing cloth and leather

name: Net
description: A square net made of rope that can be used for fishing or trapping medium or smaller creatures.

name: Oil Lantern
description: A metal lantern that burns oil to provide bright light within a 5 unit radius.

name: Painting Kit
description: A leather satchel containing an assortment of pigments, brushes, and mixing tools. Includes vials of various colored paints derived from minerals and plants, fine-tipped brushes made from sable hair, palette knives, and a mixing board. Essential for artists, scribes, and those who work with glyphs and magical inscriptions.

name: Set of Manacles
description: Metal restraints that can bind a creature's arms or legs that require a thievery check of 8 to open with the correct tools.

name: Sharpening Stone
description: A whetstone for maintaining blade edges

name: Short Metal Chain
description: A short length of chain ideal for manacles or securing small items.

name: Shovel
description: A sturdy digging tool with wooden handle and iron blade

name: Skinning Knife
description: A curved blade designed for removing pelts from game animals

name: Smithing Bellows
description: Leather bellows for stoking forge fires to proper temperature

name: Smithing Hammer
description: A specialized hammer for shaping hot metal on an anvil

name: Smithing Tongs
description: Long-handled tongs for safely handling hot metal

name: Tent
description: A basic canvas shelter that sleeps two people

name: Torch
description: A wooden stick with cloth soaked in pitch, burns for 1 hour

name: Wearable Oil Lantern
description: A small lantern with belt clip, provides hands-free light within a 3 unit radius.

name: Iron-Head Arrow
description: NO DESCRIPTION

name: Wooden Arrow
description: NO DESCRIPTION

name: Chainmail
description: Armor made from interlocking metal rings. Excellent protection against slashing attacks but heavy and noisy.

name: Leather Armor
description: Armor made from thick, boiled leather. Provides decent protection while maintaining flexibility.

name: Plate Armor
description: Full suit of articulated metal plates. The pinnacle of personal protection, though extremely heavy and restrictive.

name: Robes
description: Simple cloth robes that offer minimal protection but allow complete freedom of movement. Common attire for scholars and mages.

name: Scale Mail
description: Armor made from overlapping metal scales sewn onto a leather backing. Offers better protection than chain with slightly less flexibility.

name: Studded Leather
description: Leather armor reinforced with metal rivets that provides mild protection.

name: Armored Boots
description: Heavy boots reinforced with steel plates. While they offer superior protection, their weight and noise make stealth difficult.

name: Fur Boots
description: Heavy boots lined with thick fur and reinforced with leather. Excellent for cold climates but bulky for stealth.

name: Leather Boots
description: Sturdy boots made from thick leather with reinforced soles. Perfect for long journeys and rough terrain.

name: Simple Shoes
description: Basic cloth or soft leather shoes suitable for everyday wear in towns and cities. Not ideal for rough terrain.

name: Fur Cloak
description: A heavy cloak lined with thick wolf fur. While somewhat cumbersome, it provides excellent protection against the harshest winter conditions.

name: Scout's Cloak
description: A lightweight cloak dyed in mottled greens and browns. The irregular pattern helps break up the wearer's silhouette in natural environments, granting a bonus dice to stealth checks.

name: Traveler's Cloak
description: A sturdy wool cloak with a deep hood, designed to protect against wind and rain. Popular among merchants and wanderers for its durability.

name: Elixir of Antidote
description: Upon consumption, this elixir immediately reduces the required check to recover from poison by 2. Taking this elixir again does not provide any additional benefit until a full rest is completed. If at least a vial of poison or venom is mixed into the elixir and left to steep for one hour, it will then instantly cure any poisoning caused by that same substance.

name: Elixir of Awakening
description: When consuming this elixir, an unconscious humanoid or beast immediately regains consciousness. If the creature is unconscious due to reaching 0 health, they only become conscious if they currently have more than 5 health.

name: Elixir of Healing
description: A humanoid or beast that consumes this elixir heals for an additional 1d4 after completing their next full rest. A creature can only benefit from an elixir that restores health in this way once per day.

name: Elixir of Rejuvenation
description: A humanoid or beast that consumes this elixir completely restores their health after completing their next full rest. A creature can only benefit from an elixir that restores health in this way once per day.

name: Elixir of Restoration
description: An elixir that when consumed immediately cures non-permanent causes of deafness, muteness, and blindness.

name: Fire Bomb
description: A cylindrical object that when thrown or destroyed creates an explosion of heat and fire within a 1 unit radius of it's origin, dealing 2d8 heat damage. Any creature that takes more than 10 heat damage after mitigations are applied also becomes ignited.

name: Flash Bomb
description: A cylindrical object that when thrown or destroyed creates a blinding flash of light within a 1 unit radius of its origin. Creatures in the area must make a resilience check of 6 or become dazed (cannot use concentration) for 1 round. Creatures can use their reaction to cover their eyes to avoid the effect entirely.

name: Shrapnel Bomb
description: A cylindrical object that when thrown or destroyed creates an explosion of metal fragments within a 1 unit radius of its origin, dealing 4d4 physical damage. Any creature that takes more than 8 damage after mitigations are applied also gains the bleeding condition.

name: Smoke Bomb
description: A cylindrical object that when thrown or destroyed creates an cloud of smoke within a 2 unit radius of it's origin that lasts lasts for 2 rounds. Creatures that are completely within the smoke are considered blinded, and attacks that originate from outside the smoke directed at a creature completely within it are rolled with 2 penalty dice.

name: Sticky Bomb
description: A cylindrical object that when thrown or destroyed creates a puddle of sticky substance within a 1 unit radius of it's origin that lasts lasts for 2 rounds. Creatures that start their turn in, or walk through the puddle must make a might check of 5, or they become impaired until the start of their next turn.

name: Basilisk Poison
description: A poison that when ingested or applied through a coated weapon causes 5 toxic damage each round, requiring an initial endurance check of 9 to avoid. As with all poisons, this check is reduced by 1 each time it is made, with the effects of the poison being cleared upon a success. If a creature takes damage from this poison 5 times, they turn into stone and enter a stasis.

name: Deadly Poison
description: A poison that when ingested or applied through a coated weapon causes 6 toxic damage each round, requiring an initial endurance check of 9 to avoid. As with all poisons, this check is reduced by 1 each time it is made, with the effects of the poison being cleared upon a success.

name: Paralytic Venom
description: A poison that when ingested or applied through a coated weapon causes the impaired condition, requiring an initial endurance check of 8 to avoid. As with all poisons, this check is reduced by 1 each time it is made, with the effects of the poison being cleared upon a success. While poisoned, the creature cannot move or take reactions.

name: Tranquilizer Serum
description: A poison that when ingested or applied through a coated weapon requiring an initial endurance check of 9 to avoid. As with all poisons, this check is reduced by 1 each time it is made, with the effects of the poison being cleared upon a success. While this potion does not deal damage, if the effect isn't removed after 3 checks after the initial check, the poisoned creature falls asleep.

name: Vial of Blight
description: A poison that when ingested or applied through a coated weapon causes 4 dark damage each round, requiring an initial endurance check of 9 to avoid. As with all poisons, this check is reduced by 1 each time it is made, with the effects of the poison being cleared upon a success. Plantoids take double dark damage from this poison.

name: Potion of Big Mind
description: A concoction that sharpens the user's mental faculties at the cost of making them more prone to psychic attacks. For the next four hours, the consumer gets a bonus dice on all mind and knowledge checks but any psychic damage they take is doubled before applying mitigations.

name: Potion of Calming
description: A concoction that calms the consumer until they complete their next full rest, making them more resistant to effects that cause the afraid, confused or maddened condition. When making their first check to end one of these conditions, the required check to end the condition starts 2 less than normal.

name: Potion of Forgetting
description: A concoction that allows the user to erase a single memory. This can be used to unlearn a module and gain the points back, remove the broken condition, or rid the consumer of an event specificed by the potion creator at the time of brewing.

name: Potion of Luck
description: A concoction that gives the consumer supernatural luck for an hour. During this time, any 1 that is rolled during any check on a dice d6 or higher is rerolled once. An individual can only benefit once from this potion before taking a full rest.

name: Potion of Polymorph
description: A concoction that turns the consumer into a standard tier or lower beast or monster for an hour. While transformed in this way, the consumer retains their mind and knowledge abilities, but uses the statblock of the creature. Reaching 0 health while in this form results in the consumer reverting back to their original form. The consumer can attempt to resist this affect by making an endurance check of 5 or higher. This transformation is non-magical and can only be ended early if the consumer uses a potion of true form.

name: Potion of Quick Tongue
description: A concoction that grants the consumer a bonus to speechcraft, allowing them to speak a language they know at one level higher than they normally would be able to until they complete a full rest.

name: Potion of Rage
description: This concoction causes the consumer to enter an unstoppable rage for the next minute, granting a bonus dice to all endurance, resilience and might checks while inhibiting their focus, not allowing them to use their concentration. The consumer can attempt to resist this affect by making an endurance check of 6 or higher.

name: Potion of Reflex
description: This concoction causes the consumer of this potion to gain a bonus dice to all finesse checks for the next hour.

name: Potion of Serpent Sight
description: The consumer of this potion gains unnatural vision for the next 4 hours, granting them a bonus check to senses checks based on sight as well as infravision.

name: Potion of Sleep
description: A concoction that when consumed causes the affected individual to immediately fall asleep upon failing a concentration check of 6. If the container is destroyed, it creates a gaseous cloud within a 2 unit radius that requires a concentration check of 3 or higher to avoid the effects.

name: Potion of the Leviathan
description: A concoction that causes the consumer to grow gills and sprout webbed toes and fingers for an hour. These anatomical changes give them a swim speed of 8 units and allow underwater breathing.

name: Potion of the Spider
description: A concoction that allows the consumer to scale any surface effortlessly, granting them a climb speed of 4 for the next hour. While affected by this potion, the consumer can stick to any surface, even hanging upside-down and traverse it without being required to make a check if their movement is simple.

name: Potion of the Titan
description: A concoction that grants the consumer supernatural strength for an hour, allowing them to use a d20 for any might check while still using their talent to determine the number of dice.

name: Potion of True Form
description: A concoction that causes the consumer to immediately revert to their true form if they are under the effect of any type of transformation magic or effect. The consumer can attempt to resist this affect by making a resilience check of 6 or higher.

name: Potion of True Polymorph
description: A concoction that turns the consumer into a champion tier or lower beast or monster permanently, inheriting their entire statblock. While the consciousness may remain in remnants, the mind is limited by that of the statblock. The consumer can attempt to resist this affect by making an endurance check of 4 or higher. This transformation is non-magical and can only be reversed by a potion of true form.

name: Cloth Gloves
description: Simple cotton gloves that provide basic protection from cold and rough surfaces. Favored by merchants and scribes.

name: Fur Gloves
description: Thick gloves lined with soft fur, designed for harsh winter conditions. While warm, they reduce manual dexterity.

name: Leather Gloves
description: Well-fitted gloves made from supple leather. They offer protection from basic elements.

name: Steel Gauntlets
description: Heavy metal gauntlets with articulated fingers. While they provide excellent protection, they make delicate tasks nearly impossible.

name: Flint
description: NO DESCRIPTION

name: Bundle of Bloodthorn
description: Thorny vines that cause anger and intense emotions when touched, often found growing around corpses

name: Bundle of Echinacea
description: Purple coneflowers popular for their immune-boosting properties in herbal remedies

name: Bundle of Embervine
description: A dark red vine with glowing orange veins that gives off faint warmth when touched

name: Bundle of Eyestalk
description: A rare plant with a single bulbous growth that resembles an eye, complete with vein-like roots

name: Bundle of Frostleaf
description: Thin pale blue leaves that shimmer with frost even in warm climates

name: Bundle of Gingko
description: Fan-shaped leaves known for improving memory and concentration in alchemical brews

name: Bundle of Ginseng
description: Prized roots known for revitalizing properties and use in longevity potions

name: Bundle of Golden Poppy
description: Bright golden flowers known for their use in sleep-inducing potions

name: Bundle of Grave Moss
description: Dark, spongy moss that thrives on graves and around decomposing organic matter. This morbid plant feeds on death and decay, absorbing the essence of rotting flesh and bone. The moss has an unpleasant odor and feels cold to the touch.

name: Bundle of Guarana
description: A plant with seeds known for stimulating properties and use in energy potions

name: Bundle of Incense
description: Aromatic sticks and resins used to create pleasant atmosphere or in ritual practices

name: Bundle of Licorice
description: Sweet woody roots often used in medicinal concoctions for their distinct flavor

name: Bundle of Lion's Mane
description: A collection of golden-brown mane hair taken from a lion, tied with red thread. The hair seems to radiate warmth and courage, stirring feelings of bravery in those who hold it. Prized by warriors and clerics alike for spells that inspire valor and fearlessness.

name: Bundle of Mandrake
description: Forked roots resembling human form, notorious in folklore for magical practices and potions

name: Bundle of Mint
description: Fresh green leaves commonly used for their refreshing taste and aroma in cooking and teas

name: Bundle of Mugwort
description: A silvery herb used in dream magic and various protective rituals

name: Bundle of Nightshade
description: A dangerous poisonous plant with dark berries, used in various dark alchemical recipes

name: Bundle of Peppermint
description: Fresh mint leaves with a cooling sensation, known for refreshing scent and medicinal uses

name: Bundle of Rosemary
description: Fragrant needle-like herbs with woody scent, used in both culinary and medicinal practices

name: Bundle of Saffron
description: Delicate red threads from crocus flowers, a rare and valuable spice with coloring properties

name: Bundle of Sage
description: Gray-green leaves often used for culinary purposes and in rituals for cleansing and protection

name: Bundle of Valerian Root
description: Pungent roots commonly used in sleep aids and calming potions

name: Bundle of Yarrow
description: White flowering herb commonly used in traditional medicine for its healing properties

name: Animal Fat
description: Rendered fat used as a base for salves and slow-release potions

name: Beast's Eyeball
description: A preserved eyeball from a wild beast, still retaining the primal essence of the creature's natural form. The iris holds faint magical properties that resonate with transformation magic, making it a key component in spells that alter physical shape. The eyeball must be kept in a sealed vial to prevent decay.

name: Beeswax
description: Natural wax used to bind powders, thicken liquids, and seal containers

name: Bone Dust
description: Finely ground bone powder used in alchemy for structure and mineral content

name: Brass Idol
description: A small figurine cast from polished brass, depicting a divine being with outstretched arms. The idol gleams with a warm golden hue and feels slightly warm to the touch, as if holding residual divine energy.

name: Chalk Powder
description: Fine calcium carbonate powder that neutralizes acids and stabilizes alchemical reactions

name: Charcoal
description: Activated carbon from burned wood, used to absorb toxins and purify liquids in alchemical preparations

name: Coal
description: A black combustible rock that burns with intense heat and flame

name: Copper Idol
description: A small idol crafted from burnished copper, showing a figure in meditation. The copper has developed a distinctive green patina in places, giving it an ancient appearance. Commonly used in healing and restoration magic.

name: Ember Dust
description: A fine, glowing orange-red powder that radiates gentle warmth and occasionally releases tiny sparks. Created through careful alchemical mixing of combustible elements, this dust maintains a constant internal heat that makes it useful for both magical and practical applications. When sprinkled, it leaves behind faint scorch marks and the acrid scent of sulfur. This recipe yields 5 doses.

name: Flint
description: A hard stone that produces sparks when struck against metal

name: Frost Dust
description: A pale blue crystalline powder that chills everything it touches and causes ice crystals to form in the surrounding air. Created through an endothermic alchemical reaction between ammonia vapors and pulverized crystal, this dust absorbs heat from its environment and maintains a temperature well below freezing. When exposed to moisture, it instantly forms a thin layer of frost. The dust must be stored in insulated containers to prevent it from freezing other materials. This recipe yields 5 doses.

name: Gold Idol
description: An exquisite figurine crafted from pure gold, depicting a radiant deity with wings spread wide. The idol's surface is polished to a mirror finish and inscribed with ancient holy symbols that pulse with divine power when touched by the faithful.

name: Human Skull
description: A cleaned and preserved human skull, often used in necromantic rituals. The bone has been treated to prevent decay and maintains its structural integrity for magical purposes.

name: Iron Idol
description: A rough-hewn idol forged from cold iron, depicting a stern protector deity. Despite its crude appearance, the idol radiates an aura of strength and unwavering resolve. Often used in protective wards and banishment rituals.

name: Lodestone
description: A naturally magnetized piece of iron ore that attracts metallic objects. The stone emanates a subtle field that causes nearby metal shavings to align in patterns around it. Prized by navigators and mages alike for its repelling and attracting properties.

name: Pinch of Ash
description: Fine gray powder left behind after wood or bone has burned completely

name: Pinch of Crystal Dust
description: Powdered quartz crystal used to clarify solutions and store magical energy

name: Pinch of Gypsum Powder
description: Soft white mineral that hardens when mixed with water, used for binding and molding

name: Pinch of Ochre Dust
description: Iron-rich clay powder in red or yellow, used as pigment and drying agent in alchemy

name: Pinch of Phosphorus
description: White powder that glows faintly and ignites spontaneously in air

name: Pinch of Potash Powder
description: Alkaline salt from wood ash, used in soap making and alchemical reactions

name: Pinch of Saltpeter
description: White crystalline powder that burns rapidly when ignited

name: Pinch of Sulfur
description: Yellow powder with a distinctive acrid smell that burns blue

name: Pinch of Talc Powder
description: Soft mineral powder that absorbs moisture and prevents sticking in alchemical mixtures

name: Pine Resin
description: Sticky tree sap used as an adhesive, binding agent, and preservative in alchemy

name: Pixie Dust
description: A shimmering, iridescent powder that sparkles with all the colors of the rainbow and carries the sweet, refreshing scent of wild mint and honey. Created by grinding crystal dust with aromatic herbs beloved by fey creatures, then binding the mixture with honey's natural magic-conducting properties. The dust seems to float and dance in the air when disturbed, creating tiny swirling motes of light that fade after a few seconds. This recipe yields 5 doses.

name: Rubber Sap
description: A sticky, amber-colored sap that hardens into a flexible, bouncing material when exposed to air. Harvested from the rare Springwood trees found in enchanted forests, this natural rubber maintains its elasticity for months after collection. When used in magic, it imbues spells with properties of flexibility and stretch.

name: Scroll
description: A blank parchment scroll made from quality vellum, suitable for writing spells, contracts, or important documents. The surface is smooth and receptive to both ink and magical inscriptions.

name: Shard of Obsidian
description: A sharp fragment of volcanic glass with razor-like edges

name: Silver Idol
description: An intricately carved silver figurine depicting a celestial guardian. The surface is etched with holy symbols that seem to catch and reflect light in unusual ways, creating a subtle halo effect around the idol.

name: Spark Dust
description: A crackling blue-white powder that constantly arcs with tiny bolts of electricity between its particles. The dust emits a sharp ozone smell and causes hair to stand on end when handled. Created by combining conductive metal shavings with reactive phosphorus, this alchemical mixture stores and releases electrical energy in small bursts. It must be kept in non-conductive containers to prevent discharge. This recipe yields 5 doses.

name: Stabilizing Salt
description: Alchemically refined mineral salts that extend the duration of magical effects

name: Tarot Card
description: One of many mystical cards depicting archetypal symbols and figures. Each card is meticulously painted with silver-infused inks on treated parchment, allowing it to channel divinatory energies. These cards are commonly used in fortune-telling rituals and as components for divination spells.

name: Treated Scroll
description: An expensive scroll that has been specially prepared with alchemical treatments and magical primers. The parchment shimmers faintly and can hold powerful magical inscriptions that would destroy lesser materials.

name: Vial of Acid
description: Dilute acid extracted from citrus fruits or vinegar, used for etching and dissolving

name: Vial of Alchemist's Spirits
description: Highly purified alcohol distilled multiple times through copper alembics, used as a solvent and preservative in alchemical preparations

name: Vial of Ammonia
description: Pungent liquid from fermented urine, used for cleaning and chemical reactions

name: Vial of Caustic Lye
description: Concentrated alkaline solution made from ash and lime, used in alchemy to break down organic matter and intensify reactions

name: Vial of Dried Blood
description: A small vial containing dark, coagulated blood that has been carefully drained and preserved. The blood maintains a faint warmth and magical resonance, making it useful for dark magic that requires a life essence component. Can be created by voluntarily sacrificing 1 point of health and allowing the blood to dry naturally over several hours.

name: Vial of Holy Water
description: Pure water blessed with silver shavings, creating a sacred mixture that glows faintly with divine energy. The silver particles remain suspended in the water, creating swirling patterns that never settle. Essential for divine magic and purification rituals.

name: Vial of Pitch
description: Black tar from pine trees, used for waterproofing and adhesion in alchemy

name: Vial of Quicksilver
description: Liquid mercury used in transmutation and as a catalyst for alchemical reactions

name: Vial of Venom
description: Concentrated venom extracted from serpents and venomous creatures, used to enhance poison potency

name: Voodoo Doll
description: A small humanoid figure crafted from cloth and stuffed with herbs, bound with dark thread and pierced with pins. Used in sympathetic magic rituals to establish connections with distant targets. The doll's crude features seem to shift in the shadows.

name: Wood Treatment Oil
description: A blend of linseed and other natural oils used to seal and preserve wood, preventing moisture damage and maintaining flexibility in wooden weapons and tools

name: Zephyr Dust
description: An ethereally light powder that seems to dance and swirl in the slightest breeze. Created from finely ground talc mixed with reactive saltpeter, this dust captures the essence of gentle winds and moving air. The powder never fully settles, always maintaining a subtle motion that mimics the flow of wind currents. This recipe yields 5 doses.

name: Bottle of Vinegar
description: Sour fermented liquid used for preserving foods and adding tangy flavor

name: Cooking Oil
description: A bottle of refined oil extracted from plants, used for frying and cooking

name: Dried Herbs
description: A collection of dried culinary herbs like thyme, oregano, and basil

name: Dried Meat
description: Preserved strips of meat that keep well during long journeys

name: Fresh Eggs
description: A dozen farm-fresh eggs essential for baking and cooking protein-rich meals

name: Fresh Milk
description: A pitcher of creamy milk from farm animals, used for drinking and cooking

name: Fruit
description: A piece of fresh fruit like apple, orange, or banana, perfect for snacks or meals

name: Jar of Honey
description: Golden sweet syrup produced by bees, used for sweetening and preservation

name: Nuts
description: A mixture of tree nuts like almonds, walnuts, and hazelnuts for snacking or cooking

name: Pickled Vegetables
description: Vegetables preserved in brine that add tangy flavor to meals

name: Pinch of Salt
description: A small quantity of salt, essential for seasoning and preserving food

name: Pinch of Spices
description: A mixture of various spices used to enhance the flavor of numerous dishes

name: Pinch of Sugar
description: A pinch of sugar used to sweeten foods and beverages

name: Sack of Beans
description: A large sack containing dried beans, a protein-rich staple food

name: Sack of Flour
description: A large sack of ground grain flour, essential for baking bread and pastries

name: Sack of Rice
description: A large sack of dried rice grains, a versatile staple grain

name: Sack of Sugar
description: A large sack of refined sugar crystals used for sweetening and preservation

name: Smoked Fish
description: Fish preserved through smoking process, giving it rich flavor and long shelf life

name: Spices (Tier 1)
description: Common culinary spices like pepper, salt, and basic herbs that add +1 to all meal effects

name: Spices (Tier 2)
description: Exotic spices like saffron, cardamom, and rare peppers that add +2 to all meal effects

name: Spices (Tier 3)
description: Magical spices infused with elemental essences and mystical properties that add +3 to all meal effects

name: Vegetable
description: A fresh vegetable such as carrot, potato, or onion, essential for basic nutrition

name: Wheel of Cheese
description: A round block of aged cheese with rich flavor and firm texture

name: Yeast
description: Live cultures essential for making bread rise and fermenting beverages

name: Agate
description: A banded stone with layers of different colors and patterns

name: Alexandrite
description: A color-changing crystal that shifts from green to red in different light

name: Amber
description: A fossilized resin with golden color and transparent appearance

name: Amethyst
description: A purple quartz crystal with deep violet hues and glassy luster

name: Aquamarine
description: A pale blue crystal with sea-like transparency and clarity

name: Azurite
description: A deep blue stone with intense color and crystalline structure

name: Black Diamond
description: A rare black crystal with intense sparkle and metallic luster

name: Black Pearl
description: A dark lustrous sphere with iridescent surface and metallic sheen

name: Bloodstone
description: A dark green stone with red spots resembling drops of blood

name: Carnelian
description: An orange-red stone with translucent appearance and smooth surface

name: Chalcedony
description: A translucent stone with waxy luster and pale colors

name: Citrine
description: A yellow-orange quartz crystal with warm, sunny transparency

name: Diamond
description: A brilliant clear crystal known for its hardness and light refraction

name: Emerald
description: A rich green crystal with deep color and natural inclusions

name: Fire Opal
description: A translucent orange-red stone with internal flashes of light

name: Flame Emerald
description: A fiery green crystal with orange-red inclusions resembling flames

name: Frost Sapphire
description: A brilliant ice-blue sapphire that radiates cold energy and seems to frost the air around it

name: Garnet
description: A deep red crystal with wine-like color and vitreous shine

name: Hematite
description: A metallic gray stone with heavy weight and mirror-like shine

name: Jade
description: A smooth green stone with waxy luster and tough composition

name: Jasper
description: An opaque stone with earth-tone colors and smooth texture

name: Lapis Lazuli
description: A deep blue stone with gold flecks and opaque surface

name: Malachite
description: A bright green stone with swirled patterns and opaque surface

name: Moonstone
description: A milky white stone with blue flashes that shimmer like moonlight

name: Obsidian
description: A volcanic glass with black color and mirror-like surface

name: Onyx
description: A black stone with white bands and polished surface

name: Opal
description: A milky stone with flashes of rainbow colors within

name: Pearl
description: A smooth white sphere with lustrous surface and natural shine

name: Peridot
description: A bright green goods known for its clear, glassy appearance

name: Quartz
description: A clear crystal with glassy luster and six-sided structure

name: Ruby
description: A deep red crystal with intense color and brilliant shine

name: Sapphire
description: A vibrant blue crystal with exceptional clarity and hardness

name: Shadow Onyx
description: A jet-black onyx that absorbs light and radiates dark energy, casting unnatural shadows

name: Sky Emerald
description: A pale blue-green crystal with ethereal clarity and sky-like hues

name: Spirit Moonstone
description: A luminous moonstone that phases between the material and ethereal planes, pulsing with mystical energy

name: Star Ruby
description: A deep red gem displaying a six-pointed star pattern when light hits it

name: Storm Topaz
description: A golden topaz crackling with internal electrical energy that sparks and flickers like captured lightning

name: Topaz
description: A golden-yellow crystal with exceptional brilliance and hardness

name: Turquoise
description: A blue-green stone with opaque appearance and waxy luster

name: Void Amethyst
description: A deep purple amethyst that seems to bend light around it and whispers with psychic energy

name: Aetherium Ingot
description: A mystical metal that seems to defy the natural laws of weight and mass. Aetherium appears to shimmer with an inner light and feels almost weightless despite its solid form. This rare material is said to come from places where the veil between worlds is thin.

name: Brass Ingot
description: An alloy ingot created by smelting copper and tin together in precise ratios, producing a golden-colored metal with excellent corrosion resistance and workability

name: Cobalt Ingot
description: NO DESCRIPTION

name: Copper Ingot
description: A reddish-brown metal ingot known for its malleability and excellent heat and electrical conductivity. Copper is one of the easiest metals to work with and is often used for practice pieces and decorative items.

name: Electrum Ingot
description: NO DESCRIPTION

name: Gold Ingot
description: NO DESCRIPTION

name: Iron Ingot
description: A refined bar of iron metal, smelted and shaped for use in crafting. Iron is abundant and reliable, making it the backbone of most metalworking projects.

name: Lead Ingot
description: NO DESCRIPTION

name: Nickel Nugget
description: NO DESCRIPTION

name: Platinum Ingot
description: NO DESCRIPTION

name: Silver Ingot
description: A precious metal ingot with a brilliant white luster. Silver is highly valued for currency, jewelry, and decorative items. It is also known for its conductivity and resistance to corrosion.

name: Starsteel Ingot
description: A legendary metal that supposedly fell from the heavens in ancient meteorites. Starsteel has an otherworldly blue-silver sheen and exhibits properties that seem to transcend normal metallurgy. Even master smiths find it incredibly challenging to work with.

name: Steel Ingot
description: A high-quality steel ingot created by carefully controlling the carbon content in iron during the smelting process. Steel is stronger and more durable than iron, though more challenging to work with.

name: Tin Ingot
description: NO DESCRIPTION

name: True Steel Ingot
description: An exceptional grade of steel created through masterful forging techniques and precise temperature control. True steel represents the pinnacle of traditional metallurgy, prized for its perfect balance of hardness and flexibility.

name: Aetherium Nugget
description: NO DESCRIPTION

name: Cobalt Nugget
description: NO DESCRIPTION

name: Copper Nugget
description: NO DESCRIPTION

name: Electrum Nugget
description: NO DESCRIPTION

name: Gold Nugget
description: NO DESCRIPTION

name: Iron Nugget
description: NO DESCRIPTION

name: Lead Nugget
description: NO DESCRIPTION

name: Nickel Nugget
description: NO DESCRIPTION

name: Platinum Nugget
description: NO DESCRIPTION

name: Silver Nugget
description: NO DESCRIPTION

name: Starsteel Nugget
description: NO DESCRIPTION

name: Steel Nugget
description: NO DESCRIPTION

name: Tin Nugget
description: NO DESCRIPTION

name: Aetherium Shavings
description: NO DESCRIPTION

name: Cobalt Shavings
description: NO DESCRIPTION

name: Copper Shavings
description: NO DESCRIPTION

name: Electrum Shavings
description: NO DESCRIPTION

name: Gold Shavings
description: NO DESCRIPTION

name: Iron Shavings
description: NO DESCRIPTION

name: Lead Shavings

description: NO DESCRIPTION

name: Starsteel Shavings

name: Steel Shavings

name: Tin Shavings

name: Aetherium Mail
description: Interlocking aetherium rings that shimmer with otherworldly energy. These mystical links provide protection without hindering movement.

name: Aetherium Plates
description: Mystical aetherium armor plates that seem to defy weight while maintaining protection. These otherworldly plates make armor feel weightless.

name: Aetherium Point
description: A sharp aetherium point component that seems to phase through matter while maintaining deadly sharpness. This mystical component makes piercing weapons feel weightless in the wielder's hands.

name: Ash Heavy Limbs
description: Long, powerful ash wood limb components crafted for large bows such as longbows, warbows, and heavy crossbows. These flexible yet strong limbs provide reliable performance.

name: Ash Light Limbs
description: Long, powerful ash wood limb components crafted for large bows such as longbows, warbows, and heavy crossbows. These flexible yet strong limbs provide reliable performance.

name: Bindings
description: Essential fabrication components including rivets, pins, nails, washers, bolts, clamps, hinges, brackets, fasteners, and various small metal fittings required for crafting weapons, armor, and other metal goods

name: Brass Fittings
description: Precision connectors and joints made from copper and tin alloy. Used for articulation points in complex mechanisms

name: Brass Sheet
description: A hammered sheet of brass alloy, combining the malleability of copper with the strength of tin. Ideal for precision components and decorative elements

name: Bundle of Copper Wire
description: Flexible copper strands useful in crafting jewelry and electrical conduits for magical devices. This wire can be created by cutting a copper sheet into strips and combining them through heat.

name: Clockwork Gears
description: A set of precisely cut interlocking gears made from steel sheets. Essential for any clockwork mechanism

name: Cloth Padding
description: Simple cloth padding to provide comfort under armor. This basic material prevents chafing and absorbs impact.

name: Copper Sheet
description: A hammered sheet of copper, excellent for conducting heat and creating flexible metal components

name: Greater Aetheric Core
description: A superior magical focus core embedded with a luminous spirit moonstone that channels devastating mystical energy. This enhanced core allows for more powerful aetheric magical attacks.

name: Greater Cold Core
description: A superior magical focus core embedded with a brilliant frost sapphire that channels devastating frost energy. This enhanced core allows for more powerful cold-based magical attacks.

name: Greater Dark Core
description: A superior magical focus core embedded with a sinister black diamond that channels devastating shadow energy. This enhanced core allows for more powerful dark magical attacks.

name: Greater Divine Core
description: A superior magical focus core embedded with a brilliant diamond that channels devastating divine energy. This enhanced core allows for more powerful divine magical attacks.

name: Greater Electric Core
description: A superior magical focus core embedded with a brilliant storm topaz that channels devastating electrical energy. This enhanced core allows for more powerful lightning-based magical attacks.

name: Greater Heat Core
description: A superior magical focus core embedded with a brilliant ruby that channels devastating thermal energy. This enhanced core allows for more powerful heat-based magical attacks.

name: Greater Psychic Core
description: A superior magical focus core embedded with a mesmerizing void amethyst that channels devastating mental energy. This enhanced core allows for more powerful psychic magical attacks.

name: Iron Heavy Blade
description: A substantial iron blade component designed for crafting large slashing weapons such as longswords, greataxes, battleaxes, and greatswords. This reliable component provides solid cutting power at an affordable cost.

name: Iron Heavy Head
description: A substantial iron head component designed for crafting large blunt weapons such as warhammers, greathammers, and mauls. This reliable component provides solid crushing power at an affordable cost.

name: Iron Light Blade
description: A compact iron blade component designed for crafting smaller slashing weapons such as scimitars, handaxes, short swords, and falchions. This reliable component provides solid cutting power at an affordable cost.

name: Iron Light Head
description: A compact iron head component designed for crafting small blunt weapons such as maces, clubs, and light hammers. This reliable component provides solid impact force while maintaining weapon balance.

name: Iron Mail
description: Interlocking iron rings forming flexible chain armor. These reliable links provide moderate protection while allowing mobility.

name: Iron Plates
description: Solid iron armor plates designed for heavy protection. These reliable plates provide substantial defense at an affordable cost.

name: Iron Point
description: A sharp iron point component crafted for piercing weapons of all sizes, from small daggers and rapiers to large spears and pikes. This reliable component provides solid penetrating power at an affordable cost.

name: Ironwood Heavy Limbs
description: Long, powerful ironwood limb components crafted from the densest of hardwoods. These exceptional limbs rival metal in durability while maintaining organic flexibility.

name: Ironwood Light Limbs
description: Long, powerful ironwood limb components crafted from the densest of hardwoods. These exceptional limbs rival metal in durability while maintaining organic flexibility.

name: Leather Handle
description: A leather-wrapped grip component providing comfortable control for weapons and tools.

name: Leather Lash
description: A flexible leather striking component braided from quality hide strips, essential for crafting whips and flexible weapons.

name: Lesser Aetheric Core
description: A magical focus core embedded with a shimmering spirit moonstone that channels pure mystical energy. When integrated into wands, staves, or magical weapons, it allows casters to generate aetheric attacks.

name: Lesser Cold Core
description: A magical focus core embedded with an icy frost sapphire that channels pure frost energy. When integrated into wands, staves, or magical weapons, it allows casters to generate freezing cold attacks.

name: Lesser Dark Core
description: A magical focus core embedded with a void-black shadow onyx that channels pure shadow energy. When integrated into wands, staves, or magical weapons, it allows casters to generate dark attacks.

name: Lesser Divine Core
description: A magical focus core embedded with a radiant diamond that channels pure divine energy. When integrated into wands, staves, or magical weapons, it allows casters to generate divine attacks.

name: Lesser Electric Core
description: A magical focus core embedded with a crackling storm topaz that channels pure electrical energy. When integrated into wands, staves, or magical weapons, it allows casters to generate lightning-based attacks.

name: Lesser Heat Core
description: A magical focus core embedded with a fiery ruby that channels pure thermal energy. When integrated into wands, staves, or magical weapons, it allows casters to generate intense heat-based attacks.

name: Lesser Psychic Core
description: A magical focus core embedded with a mind-bending void amethyst that channels pure mental energy. When integrated into wands, staves, or magical weapons, it allows casters to generate psychic attacks.

name: Metal Handle
description: A metal grip component offering durability and solid control for heavy-duty weapons and tools.

name: Metal Long Shaft
description: A lengthy metal shaft component providing superior strength and durability for heavy polearms requiring maximum reliability.

name: Metal Short Shaft
description: A compact metal shaft shorter than 1 unit in length providing superior durability for one-handed weapons requiring maximum strength.

name: Reinforced Long Shaft
description: A lengthy reinforced shaft component offering exceptional strength and balance for premium polearms and two-handed weapons.

name: Release Mechanism
description: A standard trigger component for crossbows and complex ranged weapons, providing basic functionality for releasing stored energy

name: Silk Bowstring
description: An exceptional bowstring crafted from spider silk, providing incredible tensile strength despite its light weight, allowing the wielder to be more accurate at shorter distances.

name: Sinew Bowstring
description: A durable bowstring crafted from processed animal sinew, providing excellent elasticity and strength.

name: Starsteel Heavy Blade
description: A substantial starsteel blade component forged from legendary celestial metal. This otherworldly component channels devastating power through its otherworldly properties.

name: Starsteel Heavy Head
description: A substantial starsteel head component forged from legendary celestial metal. This otherworldly component channels devastating power through its otherworldly properties.

name: Starsteel Heavy Limbs
description: Long, powerful starsteel limb components forged from legendary celestial metal. These otherworldly limbs channel devastating power through their divine properties.

name: Starsteel Light Blade
description: A compact starsteel blade component forged from legendary celestial metal. This otherworldly component channels devastating power through its otherworldly properties.

name: Starsteel Light Head
description: A compact starsteel head component forged from legendary celestial metal. This otherworldly component channels devastating power through its otherworldly properties.

name: Starsteel Light Limbs
description: Long, powerful starsteel limb components forged from legendary celestial metal. These otherworldly limbs channel devastating power through their divine properties.

name: Starsteel Mail
description: Interlocking starsteel rings forged from celestial metal. These divine links channel protective energies through their legendary properties.

name: Starsteel Plates
description: Legendary starsteel armor plates forged from celestial metal. These divine plates channel protective power through their otherworldly properties.

name: Starsteel Point
description: A sharp starsteel point component forged from legendary celestial metal. This otherworldly component channels devastating power through its divine sharpness.

name: Steel Heavy Blade
description: A substantial steel blade component designed for crafting large slashing weapons such as longswords, greataxes, battleaxes, and greatswords. This durable component offers improved performance over iron alternatives.

name: Steel Heavy Head
description: A substantial steel head component designed for crafting large blunt weapons of superior quality. This durable component offers improved crushing power over iron alternatives.

name: Steel Light Blade
description: A compact steel blade component designed for crafting smaller slashing weapons such as scimitars, handaxes, short swords, and falchions. This durable component offers improved performance over iron alternatives.

name: Steel Light Head
description: A compact steel head component designed for crafting small blunt weapons of improved quality. This durable component offers enhanced impact power over iron alternatives.

name: Steel Mail
description: Interlocking steel rings forming superior chain armor. These enhanced links provide better protection than iron alternatives.

name: Steel Plates
description: Durable steel armor plates offering superior protection. These enhanced plates provide better defense than iron alternatives.

name: Steel Point
description: A sharp steel point component crafted for superior piercing weapons. This durable component offers enhanced penetrating power and edge retention over iron alternatives.

name: Steel Sheet
description: A strong, durable sheet of steel formed through careful hammering. Ideal for armor plating and structural components

name: Studded Hide
description: Thick hide reinforced with metal studs for enhanced protection. This upgraded material balances defense and flexibility.

name: Thick Hide
description: Durable animal hide suitable for crafting leather armor. This natural material provides basic protection while remaining flexible.

name: Tin Sheet
description: A thin, malleable sheet of tin created by heating and hammering an ingot flat. Used for lightweight metal components

name: True Steel Heavy Blade
description: A substantial true steel blade component designed for crafting large slashing weapons of exceptional quality. This masterwork component delivers superior cutting power through advanced metallurgy.

name: True Steel Heavy Head
description: A substantial true steel head component designed for crafting exceptional large blunt weapons. This masterwork component delivers superior crushing power through advanced metallurgy.

name: True Steel Heavy Limbs
description: Long, powerful true steel limb components forged from exceptional metallurgy for masterwork heavy crossbows. These premium limbs deliver unmatched power and accuracy.

name: True Steel Light Blade
description: A compact true steel blade component designed for crafting smaller slashing weapons of exceptional quality. This masterwork component delivers superior cutting power through advanced metallurgy.

name: True Steel Light Head
description: A compact true steel head component designed for crafting superior small blunt weapons. This masterwork component delivers exceptional impact power through advanced metallurgy.

name: True Steel Light Limbs
description: Long, powerful true steel limb components forged from exceptional metallurgy for masterwork heavy crossbows. These premium limbs deliver unmatched power and accuracy.

name: True Steel Mail
description: Interlocking true steel rings forming masterwork chain armor. These advanced links deliver superior protection through refined craftsmanship.

name: True Steel Plates
description: Masterwork true steel armor plates of exceptional quality. These advanced plates deliver superior protection through refined metallurgy.

name: True Steel Point
description: A sharp true steel point component crafted for exceptional piercing weapons. This masterwork component delivers superior penetrating power through advanced metallurgy.

name: Truesteel Chainlinked Lash
description: A powerful striking component crafted from truesteel chainlinks, providing superior flexibility and striking power.

name: Wooden Handle
description: A simple wooden grip component designed for weapon hilts and tool handles, providing basic control and comfort during use.

name: Wooden Long Shaft
description: A sturdy wooden shaft component measuring 6+ feet, crafted for polearms and two-handed weapons such as pikes, halberds, glaives, and quarterstaffs.

name: Wooden Short Shaft
description: A compact wooden shaft component shorter than 1 unit in length, suitable for crafting one-handed weapons and shorter implements.

name: Yew Heavy Limbs
description: Long, powerful yew wood limb components crafted for large bows. The natural properties of yew create exceptional spring and power in these premium limbs.

name: Yew Light Limbs
description: Long, powerful yew wood limb components crafted for large bows. The natural properties of yew create exceptional spring and power in these premium limbs.

name: Bundle of Cloth
description: A collection of various fabric pieces including cotton, linen, and wool. Useful for crafting clothing, padding, and basic textile goods

name: Bundle of Heavy Leather
description: Thick, durable leather pieces perfect for armor crafting, sturdy gear, and heavy-duty applications. Requires more skill to work but provides superior protection

name: Bundle of Light Leather
description: Thin, flexible leather pieces suitable for clothing, light armor padding, and delicate leather goods. Easy to work with and comfortable to wear

name: Bundle of Silk
description: Luxurious silk fabric pieces prized for their softness, strength, and lustrous appearance. Essential for high-quality clothing and premium textile applications

name: Ash Wood
description: A reliable hardwood prized for its excellent balance of flexibility and strength. Its consistent grain and workability make it ideal for crafting quality tools and weapons

name: Hickory Wood
description: A tough, shock-resistant hardwood known for its durability and strength. Commonly used in tool handles and weapons due to its ability to withstand heavy impacts

name: Ironwood
description: An exceptionally dense and resilient hardwood that rivals metal in durability. Master craftsmen prize this rare wood for creating items of unmatched strength and longevity

name: Yew Wood
description: A premium hardwood featuring exceptional natural elasticity and strength. Its unique grain structure provides superior performance in flexible applications and fine craftsmanship

name: Armored Helmet
description: A metal helmet with reinforced crown and cheek guards that slightly obstructs your senses. While wearing this helmet, you cannot become dazed from a melee attack.

name: Fur Hat
description: A warm cap made from thick fur with ear flaps. Provides excellent protection against cold but can muffle sounds.

name: Leather Helmet
description: A simple leather cap reinforced with hardened leather strips.

name: Plate Helmet
description: A full helm of articulated steel plates with a narrow visor. While obscuring senses, the plate helmet provides benefits against concussive forces. When you become stunned due to a melee attack, you become dazed instead and you cannot be dazed by melee attacks.

name: Bagpipes
description: A complex wind instrument with an air reservoir and multiple pipes. Its distinctive drone and piercing melody can stir hearts or clear taverns.

name: Hunting Horn
description: A small curved horn traditionally used during hunts to coordinate riders and hounds. Its clear, carrying notes can communicate complex messages across great distances.

name: Lute
description: A pear-shaped, string instrument with a curved back, fretted fingerboard and head with tuning pegs.

name: Lyre
description: An ancient stringed instrument with a U-shaped frame. Its delicate, harp-like tones are perfect for accompanying poetry and ballads.

name: Tambourine
description: A circular frame drum with metal jingles around the edge. Popular at festivals and taverns for its bright, rhythmic sound.

name: War Drum
description: A large drum carried into battle to maintain marching tempo and boost morale. Its deep, resonant beat can be heard across the battlefield.

name: War Horn
description: A curved horn made from brass or animal horn, used to signal troops in battle. Its powerful blast can rally allies or strike fear into enemies.

name: Wooden Flute
description: A simple woodwind instrument carved from a single piece of hardwood. Its sweet, melodic tones are favored by traveling minstrels.

name: Mark of Innate Talent
description: A permanent magical tattoo that enhances the bearer's natural abilities. When inscribed, choose one attribute. The bearer gains +1 talent to that attribute permanently. A creature can only bear one Mark of Talent.

name: Rune of Minor Alarm
description: A magical inscription that creates a soft chime audible within 1 unit when the inscribed object is touched by anyone other than the attuned owner for 1 hour. Useful for detecting tampering with valuables.

name: Rune of Minor Light
description: A magical inscription that causes an object to emit a 3 unit radius of light for 1 hour.

name: Rune of Minor Preservation
description: A magical inscription that keeps organic materials fresh and prevents decay for 1 day. Food stays fresh instead of spoiling, and bodies are protected against natural decomposition, making it valuable for burial rites or medical study.

name: Rune of Minor Return
description: A magical inscription that bonds an item to a single word in any language. Anyone who knows the command word can use an action to summon the inscribed item back to their hand if it is within 3 units. The rune must be inscribed on the item to be recalled.

name: Rune of Minor Sealing
description: A magical inscription that makes it more difficult to open a container, barrier or door. Checks required to open the door by forcing it, or finding other means of opening it are increased by 2 for 1 hour.

name: Rune of Minor Silence
description: A magical inscription that muffles all sounds made by the inscribed object by half for 1 hour. Perfect for reducing noise from armor, weapons, or tools during stealth.

name: Buckler
description: A small round shield strapped to the forearm. Provides modest protection while maintaining mobility and weapon use.

name: Kite Shield
description: A large, almond-shaped shield that covers most of the torso. Excellent protection but requires significant strength to wield effectively.

name: Round Shield
description: A traditional circular shield with a metal boss in the center. Favored by warriors for its balanced protection and versatility.

name: Tower Shield
description: A massive rectangular shield that covers the entire body. Provides maximum protection but severely limits mobility and requires both hands to use effectively.

name: Advanced Lock
description: A sophisticated lock requiring a Thievery check of 12 or higher to pick without the key

name: Advanced Lock Pick
description: A superior version of the lockpick, this metal is paired with a sticky resin that allows it to adapt to a lock, granting the user a bonus dice to their thievery check. As with a normal lockpick, this item is destroyed upon failure. The recipe for this item creates 4 picks.

name: Alarm Trap Kit
description: A motion-triggered mechanism that sounds a loud bell or whistle, alerting everyone within a moderate (20 unit) distance when activated

name: Binoculars
description: Twin telescopes mounted side-by-side for enhanced depth perception and wider field of view that have an adjustable control to shift the lenses, granting better zoom and focus. Grants 2 bonus dice to senses checks for spotting distant details.

name: Clockwork Lantern
description: A lantern that is powered by the residual energy of a crystal or gem to give off a steady light. This lantern has 3 settings; On, 5-unit light range and 10 unit light range. The color of the light is based on the type of gem or crystal used.

name: Explosive Trap Kit
description: A trip wire mechanism that detonates a placed explosive when triggered dealing 3d8 fire damage to anyone within a 2 unit radius if they fail a defense check of 9. The individual who triggers the trap automatically fails this check.

name: Lock Pick
description: A thin piece of metal used for picking locks which is destroyed on a failure. The recipe for this item creates 4 picks.

name: Mechanical Lockpick
description: A spring-loaded automatic lockpick that attempts to open locks on its own. Rolls 3d10 for thievery checks when picking locks despite the user's talent. This lock takes 1 minute to function, but is not destroyed on a failure.

name: Shooting Trap Kit
description: A pressure plate mechanism that fires loaded ammunition when triggered. Can be loaded with any arrow or bolt which is rolled with a 3d10, dealing 4 damage and 2 extra.

name: Simple Lock
description: A simple lock requiring a Thievery check of 8 or higher to pick without the key

name: Snare Trap Kit
description: A tension spring mechanism that captures and hoists a medium or smaller target when triggered if they fail a fitness check of 8.

name: Spyglass
description: A collapsible telescope for viewing distant objects, grants a bonus die to senses checks for spotting distant details

name: Battleaxe
description: A heavy, broad-bladed weapon capable of devastating cuts.

name: Falchion
description: A single-edged curved blade designed for powerful chopping strikes.

name: Flail
description: A spiked metal ball attached to a handle by a heavy chain.

name: Glaive
description: A single-edged blade mounted on the end of a long pole designed to provide long-ranged slashing attacks. There is a small weight on the pommel that allows the wielder to make blunt attacks.

name: Great-Axe
description: A massive two-handed axe with a broad crescent blade.

name: Great-Hammer
description: An enormous two-handed hammer with a massive head.

name: Great-Sword
description: A massive two-handed sword that deals devastating slashing damage.

name: Halberd
description: A versatile polearm combining an axe blade, a spear point, and a hook.

name: Longsword
description: A versatile blade equally capable of delivering devastating slashes or precise thrusts.

name: Pike
description: An extremely long thrusting polearm designed for long-ranged thrusts.

name: Rapier
description: A slender, sharply pointed sword designed for thrusting attacks.

name: Warhammer
description: A brutal weapon featuring a heavy hammerhead on one side and a sharp spike on the other.

name: Arbalest
description: A heavy crossbow that is capable at a variety of ranges and relatively easy to operate compared to a drawn bow.

name: Longbow
description: A large, powerful bow that is accurate over great distances.

name: Warbow
description: A powerful recurved bow that provides power at medium distance.

name: Club
description: A simple but effective bludgeon made from heavy wood or stone.

name: Dagger
description: A small, simple blade.

name: Handaxe
description: A small one-handed axe that can be used as a slashing weapon or tool.

name: Quarterstaff
description: A long wooden shaft that provides excellent reach.

name: Scimitar
description: A curved, single-edged blade optimized for slashing attacks.

name: Shortsword
description: A versatile blade that can be used to slash or pierce.

name: Spear
description: A simple shaft topped with a sharp point.

name: War Mace
description: A metal rod with a heavy head designed to deliver crushing blows.

name: Whip
description: A length of braided leather or chain designed to strike at range.

name: Crossbow
description: A mechanical bow mounted on a stock that shoots bolts that is easier to use than a traditional bow.

name: Hand Crossbow
description: A small one-handed crossbow, typically attached to the wrist which can fire bolts at close range without requiring a second hand.

name: Shortbow
description: A compact bow that can be used even in confined spaces.

name: Sling
description: A simple leather pouch on cords used to hurl stones or bullets.

name: Aetheric Staff
description: A magical staff infused with otherworldly energy that channels pure aetheric damage and can also be used as a blunt weapon.

name: Cold Staff
description: A magical staff infused with freezing energy that channels pure cold damage and can also be used as a blunt weapon.

name: Dark Staff
description: A magical staff infused with shadow energy that channels pure dark damage and can also be used as a blunt weapon.

name: Divine Staff
description: A magical staff infused with holy energy that channels pure divine damage and can also be used as a blunt weapon.

name: Electric Staff
description: A magical staff infused with crackling energy that channels pure electric damage and can also be used as a blunt weapon.

name: Heat Staff
description: A magical staff infused with fiery energy that channels pure heat damage and can also be used as a blunt weapon.

name: Physical Staff
description: A sturdy staff crafted for both magical focus and physical combat, channeling pure physical damage and serving as a reliable blunt weapon.

name: Psychic Staff
description: A magical staff infused with mental energy that channels pure psychic damage and can also be used as a blunt weapon.

name: Aetheric Wand
description: A magical wand infused with mystical energy that channels pure aetheric damage.

name: Cold Wand
description: A magical wand infused with freezing energy that channels pure cold damage.

name: Dark Wand
description: A magical wand infused with shadow energy that channels pure dark damage.

name: Divine Wand
description: A magical wand infused with holy energy that channels pure divine damage.

name: Electric Wand
description: A magical wand infused with crackling energy that channels pure electric damage.

name: Heat Wand
description: A magical wand infused with fiery energy that channels pure heat damage.

name: Physical Wand
description: A magical wand that channels pure physical force damage.

name: Psychic Wand
description: A magical wand infused with mental energy that channels pure psychic damage.
